title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6218.6 - Affidavits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6218.6 - Affidavits

State Regulations

When a verified statement is required or deemed desirable by
any party, it shall be sufficient for the deponent to subscribe a statement at
the end thereof that the "foregoing statement is affirmed under penalties of
perjury." A statement verified before a notary public will be equally
acceptable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6218.6

Adopted

New

York State Register November 10, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 45, eff. 11/10/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
